name: Medicham ex
author: Hikaru Koike

poke_body.name: Wise Aura
poke_body.effect: As long as Medicham ex is your Active Pokémon, each Pokémon (excluding Pokémon-ex) (both yours and your opponent’s) can’t use any Poké-Powers.

attacks.name: Pure Power
attacks.effect: Put 3 damage counters on your opponent’s Pokémon in any way you like.

attacks.name: Sky Kick
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon has {F} Resistance, this attack does 60 damage plus 40 more damage.

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
